description: The mammal had developed an untreatable neurological condition, Curraghs Wildlife Park said.
title: Endangered red panda cub put down after illness
title_page: Endangered red panda cub put down after illness - BBC News
maintext: The two cubs were the first born on the Isle of Man and were fathered by Kush, who was recaptured in January after escaping from the park for a second time.
